Title: Still Positive
Writer: Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alexander Cary
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Rupert Friend, Morena Baccarin
Plot: While Saul pretends not to mind being passed over, nominated CIA director senator Andrew Lockhart turns to Dar Adal to 'clean out the closet'. Only Quinn is told about Carrie's triple agent...
